about_the_game:
In "Fruit Salon", you'll encounter a variety of unique fruits and vegetables, each with its own personality and ailments to cure. From bananas to avocado, no produce problem is too big for you to tackle!

Using a range of lifelike tools and mechanics, you'll diagnose, treat, and pamper your fruity patients back to health.

Different tools will be available for you to help the colorful friends!

GLOW UP THE PATIENT
Cut, wash, and make a haircut for the veggies and fruits!



SCAN AND FIND
Use the scanner to check what is hidden inside!



TAKE OUT AND ELIMINATE
Take out all the stuck objects and make the colorful friend happy!



CLEAN AND SHINE
Clean them, so they can shine bright like a diamond!



DANCE AND ENJOY
Don't forget to dance and enjoy your time in Fruit Salon!



But "Fruit Salon" isn't just about fixing fruits and veggies – it's about immersing yourself in a world of whimsy and wonder. Explore vibrant environments, interact with charming characters, and uncover hidden surprises as you progress through the game.

So, whether you're a seasoned gamer looking for a fresh new experience or a casual player in search of some fruity fun, "Fruit Salon" has something for everyone. Get ready to dive into a world where healing meets entertainment, and let the adventure begin!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • VR Support: Requires motion controllers

short_description: Welcome to the Fruit Salon! Step into the shoes of a skilled fruit and veggie doctor and embark on a journey through a colorful world of healing and fun.
